power.title: Armored Assault
power.fluff: Burying your shoulder into your shield, you plow forward through anyt foe

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed. You can make the attack at any one point during this movement.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature adjacent to you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength +3 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Strength +6 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Strength +9 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: +2d10 damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target 1 square.

power.title: Bloody the Field
power.fluff: You raise your weapon high, recognizing that the time has come to finish off your foe

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If the target is bloodied, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-third the number of healing surges you have expended

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target is bloodied, it is dazed until the start of your next turn.

section.name: Axe, Hammer, or Mace:
section.text: Dazed until the end of your next turn instead.

power.title: Bludgeoning Vise
power.fluff: Your weapon crunches down on your enemy's skull before you drive your fist into your foe's face

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a hand free.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude (unarmed)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (unarmed) + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

power.title: Come and Get It
power.fluff: You brandish your weapon and call out to your foes, luring them close through their overconfidence, and then deliver a spinning strike against them all

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst that can see you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma +3 vs. Will

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Charisma +6 vs. Will

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Charisma +9 vs. Will
Do not add your weapon's enhancement bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You pull the target up to 2 squares, but only if it can end the pull adjacent to you.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage.

power.title: Echoing Assault
power.fluff: You batter the foe with a mighty swing and prepare to catch it with the backswing if it doesn't have the sense to move

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is within your reach at the start of your turn, it provokes an opportunity attack from you. You can take this opportunity attack even though it is your own turn.

power.title: Griffon's Wrath
power.fluff: You land a heavy blow on your foe, exposing a vulnerable spot in its defenses

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Axe, Pick, or Unarmed:
section.text: The target also takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude.

section.name: Flail, Heavy Blade, Light Blade, Polearm, or Spear:
section.text: The target also takes a -2 penalty to Reflex.

section.name: Hammer, Mace, or Staff:
section.text: The target also takes a -2 penalty to Will.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to AC against the first attack made against it before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hampering Flurry
power.fluff: Using both weapons, you attack your opponent's legs and hinder it with painful wounds

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
If the primary attack was also a hit, this attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier and the target cannot shift while it remains slowed.

power.title: Hydra Charge
power.fluff: Your advance seems brash, but it's actually a flurry of perfectly timed strikes that bewilder your foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst that you can see

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

power.title: Inertia Strike
power.fluff: Your tremendous swing carries your weapon to another foe even if you miss

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed melee weapon.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength -2 vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Choose a different enemy you can see in your reach. That enemy takes damage equal to 3 + your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
